peerCounsellor.name: Paraardha Goel
peerCounsellor.qualification: Pursuing Msc in Counselling and family therapy
peerCounsellor.about: I am a final year masters student of counselling and family therapy as well as early childhood education. I aspire to become an educational reforminist in coming years and also develop an intervention for improved mother-child stimulation for people in need.

peerCounsellor.name: Sahithi Mannar
peerCounsellor.about: I feel Mental health should be a topic that can be spoke on a coffee with friends and over a dinner with family .I'm a dancing psychologist who believes that the best message I can give to the world is my story.

peerCounsellor.name: Swetha Desiraju
peerCounsellor.about: Swetha Desiraju is a student of Clinical Psychology and a peer counsellor for FindHope. Her passion for mental health started when she was 18 years old. She has been in the field of mental health for 4 years now. She has also worked with children with developmental disorders. She is the Chairperson of a Suicide Prevention Awarenss Project called “Here With You”, initiated by Rotaract. She is also a LifeSkills trainer.

peerCounsellor.name: Riya Aggarwal
peerCounsellor.about: An optimistic ambivert person with qualities like empathy and communication skills
